news.title: Powell emphasizes Fed's obligation to prevent 'ongoing inflation problem' despite Trump criticism
news.summary: The cautious tones from Powell could further antagonize President Donald Trump, who has ramped up his long-standing criticism of Powell. The White House has not commented on Powell's remarks.

news.title: Amazon bringing faster delivery to thousands of small towns and cities
news.summary: Amazon previously said it would spend $4 billion by the end of 2026 to triple the size of its rural delivery network. Amazon.com is based in Seattle, Washington.

news.title: Crypto rules of the road framework unveiled by Republican senators
news.summary: Republican Sens. Tim Scott and Cynthia Lummis are pushing a crypto market structure bill. The bill would give digital asset companies clarity on regulations.

news.title: Trump and the U.S. are totally committed to NATO, alliance chief says to reassure allies
news.summary: Tensions between Washington, Canadian and European allies' defense spending have overshadowed NATO for a number of years. Tensions between U.S. and Canadian, European allies over defense spending has overshadowed NATO.

news.title: Senators will stay in DC until Trump's 'big, beautiful bill' passes, Thune says
news.summary: Sen. John Thune's comments are a sign of the growing pressure he faces to get Republican holdouts on board. Sen. Thune is a Republican from South Dakota and a member of the Senate GOP leadership.

news.title: Krispy Kreme and McDonald’s end their doughnut partnership, as it didn’t make money
news.summary: Fast-food giant and doughnut maker scrap their alliance, which rolled out nationally in March 2024, as demand kept falling. Fast-food giants and doughnuts maker scrap its alliance.

news.title: Forget the ‘Magnificent Seven’ — these 7 cheap tech and AI stocks are better buys right now
news.summary: This mutual-fund manager stays calm through uncertainty — and significantly outperforms the stock market. This mutual- fund manager stays Calm through Uncertainty.

news.title: Powell says tariffs likely to boost inflation, mum on future rate cuts
news.summary: Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell gave little sign of when U.S. interest rates will be reduced again. He told Congress that tariffs are likely to push up inflation and “weigh on economic activity”

news.title: Here are the overlooked ways to play AI, crypto and quantum trends, says this tech investor
news.summary: Investor Eric Jackson identifies the overlooked companies that can benefit from crypto, artificial intelligence and quantum technologies. Jackson: "Crypto is the next big thing in finance"

news.title: Mastercard makes a move toward stablecoins, in an effort to boost mainstream use
news.summary: Stablecoins have come into greater focus by investors. Stablecoins are a form of digital money that can be traded on the internet. They can also be used to pay for goods and services.
